channel.title: David Rouzer
channel.description: David Rouzer Republican Candidate for Congress, Seventh District of North Carolina (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: You can feel it: Our country is at a crossroads. This election will determine whether we continue on the path of more spending, more debt and economic disaster - or whether we choose real solutions and return to the basic principles of free enterprise and limited government.
item.author: David Rouzer

item.title: At this critical hour in our nation's history, we can't afford to re-elect Barack Obama - a man who believes that America is the problem.
item.author: David Rouzer

item.title: We can't afford to re-elect a man who doesn't understand that it was the hard work and achievement of the American people that made this country great. We can't afford to re-elect someone who believes that our dismal economy is doing just fine!
item.author: David Rouzer

item.title: And in North Carolina's 7th Congressional district, we can't afford to re-elect Mike McIntyre ­ a man who voted four times to make Nancy Pelosi the Speaker, and then voted with her more than 90 percent of the time - 90 percent of the time - while she controlled the House.
item.author: David Rouzer

item.title: We can't afford to re-elect a man like Mike McIntyre who said about Obama's failed stimulus, "in our part of the country ­ it has worked."
item.author: David Rouzer

item.title: Ladies and gentlemen, let's send Barack Obama, Nancy Pelosi and their lieutenant Mike McIntyre home and restore America to greatness! Elect Romney-Ryan and Rouzer on November 6! May God bless you and may God bless America.
item.author: David Rouzer
